Posted By: Laurelle (9/10/2009 9:31:05 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Well, he usually draws attention and aggression to himself when he's on the battlefield so chances are high that he gets [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt)ed right away! :-/ (believe me, I know...)  
  
But still, he **rocks**, of course! :D  
  
@ Laurelle  
  
Well, you've gotta give him shroud somehow. Or you can use [Kira](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kira) to give him - and all your other creatures! - pseudo shroud! :-)  
Works fine, I tried it (apart from the fact that Kira draws aggression to itself as well^^)!  
  
Regards from Hamburg
